title: How to Make Sweet Potato Stuffing

steps.headline: Soak the raisins in hot water for 1 hour.
Mix all of the ingredients together.
Cover, and bake until heated through.
steps.description: Uncover and bake an additional 5 minutes to brown top.

text: Preheat the oven to 350°F/180ºC.  Soak the raisins in hot water for 1 hour.  Mix all of the ingredients together.  Put into greased casserole dish.  Cover, and bake until heated through. Uncover and bake an additional 5 minutes to brown top. Remove from heat and serve.  Finished.
